parameters.name: CatalogBackupParameterFile
parameters.description: The configuration file for catalog backup.

parameters.name: CatalogBackupUsingBackint
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to use Backint to back up catalogs. Valid values:

*   true: Backint is used to back up catalogs.
*   false: Backint is not used to back up catalogs.

parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description: The ID of the SAP HANA instance.

parameters.name: DataBackupParameterFile
parameters.description: The configuration file for data backup.

parameters.name: EnableAutoLogBackup
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable automatic log backup. Valid values:

*   **true**: enables automatic log backup.
*   **false**: disables automatic log backup.

parameters.name: LogBackupParameterFile
parameters.description: The configuration file for log backup.

parameters.name: LogBackupTimeout
parameters.description: The interval at which logs are backed up. Unit: seconds.

parameters.name: LogBackupUsingBackint
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to use Backint to back up logs. Valid values:

*   true: Backint is used to back up logs.
*   false: Backint is not used to back up logs.

parameters.name: VaultId
parameters.description: The ID of the backup vault.
